Off the top of my head, most of those don't seem to do the same things as
j=
unit.  Which is better, a bicycle or a banana?  Why don't you sort your
lis=
t according to what they actually do?  Code coverage testing, for
example, =
is orthoganal to unit and regression testing.

I don't know all of those to=
ols, but I know Jtest uses Junit.  And if you're
looking at static analysis=
 tools, you should also take a look at RevJava.

 - George
